DOC.brief_title: Letrozole Combined Metformin Clomiphene Citrate ( CC ) Women With CC Resistant Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Withdrawal bleed achieve use 10 mg dydrogesterone tablet 10 day stimulation . In letrozole group , 2.5 mg letrozole oral tablet ( Femara ; Novartis Pharma Services , Switzerland ) daily day 3 menses 5 day , whereas patient combine metformin-CC group ) receive metformin HCl [ Cidophage® ; Chemical Industries Development ( CID ) , Cairo , Egypt ] , 500 mg three time daily 6-8 week . Then end period , receive 150 mg CC ( Clomid® ; Global Napi Pharmaceuticals , Cairo , Egypt ) 5 day start day 3 menstruation . Patients continue treatment three successive cycle use protocol . Metformin stop pregnancy document .
DOC.criteria: CC resistant PCOS Congenital adrenal hyperplasia Cushing syndrome Androgen secreting tumor
